footer.importantNote: Important Note: This website is designed for clients seeking legal representation in Personal Injury (PI) and Criminal Defense (CD) cases. The website allows you to submit an inquiry form to contact our firm. Please be aware that JS Law Group, LLC never charges clients any fees upfront or before providing legal services. We do not request payment, banking details, or personal financial information prior to consultation or case evaluation. All initial consultations are free, and fees are only discussed after we have reviewed your case and agreed to represent you.

pi.content:
Personal Injury

Navigating the aftermath of an injury is overwhelming, but you are not alone. We are dedicated to fighting for your rights and securing the compensation you deserve so you can focus on healing and rebuilding your life.

  • Motor Vehicle Accidents
  • Slip & Fall
  • Wrongful Death
  • Defective Products
pi.article:
Understanding Personal Injury Claim

When you are injured due to someone else's negligence, the legal and financial aftermath can be just as painful as the injury itself. Understanding your rights and getting legal help is the first step toward recovery.

Personal injury can be a devastating experience. It's never an expected event, and we're here to help you through this tough time. If you are facing personal injury, damages, or wrongful death from the negligence of others, our team of experienced lawyers is here to protect your rights and get you the compensation you deserve. Our team truly understands the pain that you're going through, and we want to get you what you need to start recovering.

As attorneys that focus on a client-centered experience, we only want the best outcome. Through legal expertise, transparent communication, and effective solutions, we will secure your rights and the recompense that you're looking for.

What Constitutes a Claim?

If you need to seek compensation for emotional, physical, or psychological harm done by another party, then our team of attorneys is here for you. If the other party committed harm due to negligence, recklessness, or intentional acts, then you might have a claim. When it was their actions - or their lack of actions - that was the direct cause of your pain, then they are potentially liable for the damage that you took. If your situation fits these criteria, then schedule a free consultation with us now to see what we can do for you.

Our Process: Investigation to Resolution

Though every case is personal and different, you can have broad expectations of various consultations, followed by dedicated investigation and collection of evidence. Once all records are obtained, then our attorneys will likely move to filing a claim and demand for compensation. If a settlement isn't reached by this point, then we may move to trial, where we will fight fiercely for your rights and the compensation you deserve.

careers:
Careers

At JS Law Group, LLC, we believe that exceptional legal service begins with exceptional people.

We are continuously seeking talented individuals who share our commitment to excellence and our passion for law.

Whether you are an experienced team member, a recent law school graduate, or a seasoned professional in legal support services, JS Law Group, LLC can offer a dynamic and rewarding career path.

We provide comprehensive training, mentorship programs, and ongoing development opportunities to help you reach your full potential. When you're with us, your success is our success too.

To apply, please submit your resume to info@jslawgroup.net today.

cd.content:
Criminal Defense

Facing criminal charges can be one of the most stressful experiences of your life, but you don't have to face it alone. We provide a robust, strategic defense to protect your freedom, your rights, and your future.

  • DUI / DWI
  • Drug Offenses
  • Violent Crimes
  • White Collar Crimes
cd.article:
Navigating Your Criminal Defense

A criminal charge can feel like the end of the world, but it doesn't have to define you or your future. A strategic, aggressive defense is critical during this time. Let us be the ones to help you.

Being charged, regardless of if it is a felony charge or a misdemeanor, can be one of the most difficult times in your life. Our team understands this and is here to help. As experienced attorneys capable of navigating trial with legal expertise and skillful solutions, we will work with you to get you the best results possible. Defending not just your rights, but also your innocence is our greatest priority.

Your Rights Are Paramount

Your constitutional rights are always in effect, and this includes when you get arrested and are held for questioning. Understanding them is your first line of defense.

  • Fourth Amendment Protection Against Unreasonable Searches and Seizures
  • Fifth Amendment Right to Remain Silent
  • Sixth Amendment Right to Legal Counsel and to Be Informed of the Charges

Common Defense Strategies

Every case is different, but our skilled attorneys are ready for anything. Even before the charges go to trial, we will be active and may try to challenge the evidence, negotiate a plea deal, or even attempt to dismiss the case. We will explore every avenue in order to protect your rights. Our team could argue your innocence, citing an alibi or a mistaken identity. We could note that your actions were committed under a legally excusable circumstance, like duress or self-defense. Our team could raise reasonable doubt against the prosecution's case, leading to a favorable outcome. Regardless of the specific method, know that our team is ready to assist and defend your case with legal expertise, effective solutions, and skillful trial maneuvering. Let us offer you a free consultation with us today.

whatToDo.title: What To Do In An Emergency
whatToDo.subtitle: Your actions right after an incident are critical. Follow these steps.

step1.title: Stay Safe & Get Help
step1.desc: Ensure you are safe. If you are injured, call 911 immediately. Your health is the first priority.

step2.title: Document Everything
step2.desc: Take photos of the scene, your injuries, and any documents. Get names and numbers of witnesses.

step3.title: Call Us 24/7 (Do Not Talk)
step3.desc: Do NOT give a statement to police or insurance. Call us immediately. We are available 24/7 to protect your rights.
